extension.summary: Sonarr: a PVR for Usenet and BitTorrent users
extension.description: Sonarr (2.0.0.5301) is a PVR for Usenet and BitTorrent users. It can monitor multiple RSS feeds for new episodes of your favorite shows and will grab, sort and rename them. It can also be configured to automatically upgrade the quality of files already downloaded when a better quality format becomes available.

extension.summary: Jackett: proxy to tracker sites
extension.description: Jackett (0.11.36) works as a proxy server: it translates queries from applications (CouchPotato, Mylar, SickRage, Sonarr, etc.) into tracker-site-specific HTTP queries, parses the HTML response, then sends results back to the requesting software. This allows for getting recent uploads (like RSS) and performing searches. Jackett is a single repository of maintained indexer scraping and translation logic, removing the burden from other applications.
extension.disclaimer: Keep it legal and carry on

extension.summary: NZBHydra: meta search for NZB indexers
extension.description: NZBHydra (0.2.233) is a meta search for NZB indexers. It provides easy access to a number of raw and newznab based indexers. You can search all your indexers from one place and use it as indexer source for tools like Sonarr or CouchPotato.
extension.disclaimer: Keep it legal and carry on

extension.summary: Thoradia VPN Network Interface: a virtual private network interface
extension.description: Thoradia VPN Network Interface (1) provides the thoradia-vpn network interface to which applications can bind. The system continues using unmodified network configuration whereas applications bound to the thoradia-vpn network interface connect to the VPN. Thoradia VPN Network Interface is compatible with VPN Manager for OpenVPN.
extension.disclaimer: Keep it legal and carry on
extension.news: 1 - Initial add-on
